name: v2
description: In this example we'll import the standard ERC-721 Non-Fungible Token (NFT) from `open-zeppelin`. This will allow us to create a unique, ownable token for each unique address that chooses to participate in our property system. There is also the ability to create an auction contract and sell a property token to another user, but that falls outside the scope of these examples. For now, we will use an NFT to represent a property and setting a URI for the property data, which we can store off-chain and offer the URI as a public GET endpoint.
